autoupdate.script: ALTER TABLE `article` ADD `order` INT NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `article` ADD `visible` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '2';
update `article` set `order` = `id`;

CREATE TABLE `article_label` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , `name` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci;
CREATE TABLE `article_line_label` (`line_id` INT NOT NULL , `label_id` INT NOT NULL) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci;
ALTER TABLE `article_label` ADD `url` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL;
CREATE TABLE `article_attached_label` (`article_id` INT NOT NULL , `label_id` INT NOT NULL) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci;
ALTER TABLE `w_sport_player` DROP PRIMARY KEY, ADD PRIMARY KEY(`id`, `position`, `season`, `team`);
ALTER TABLE `w_sport_stats` ADD `pos` INT NOT NULL AFTER `pid`;
update `w_sport_stats` `wss` set `pos` = (select `position` from `w_sport_player` where `id` = `wss`.`pid`);
ALTER TABLE `w_sport_stats` DROP PRIMARY KEY, ADD PRIMARY KEY(`pid`, `pos`, `mid`, `season`, `table_id`);
insert into `page_right`(`pid`, `gid`, `type`) (select `pid`, `gid`, 104 as `type` from `page_right` where `type` = 102);
ALTER TABLE `info` ADD `title` TINYTEXT NOT NULL AFTER `name`;
update `info` set `title` = "<web:getProperty name=\"web:currentPageName\" />";
ALTER TABLE `article_content` ADD `keywords` TINYTEXT NOT NULL AFTER `url`;

CREATE TABLE `group_perms` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , `group_id` INT NOT NULL , `name` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL , `value` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL , `type` TINYTEXT NOT NULL) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci;
ALTER TABLE `article_content` ADD `datetime` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL AFTER `timestamp`;

CREATE TABLE `web_url` ( `id` INT NOT NULL , `project_id` INT NOT NULL , `domain_url` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL , `root_url` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL , `virtual` INT NOT NULL ,`http` INT NOT NULL , `https` INT NOT NULL , `enabled` INT NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ( `id` ) ) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci;
ALTER TABLE `web_url` CHANGE `id` `id` INT( 11 ) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT;
ALTER TABLE `web_url` CHANGE `virtual` `virtual_url` TINYTEXT NOT NULL;
DROP TABLE `web_alias`;
ALTER TABLE `web_project` DROP `url` , DROP `http` , DROP `https`;
DROP TABLE `urlcache`;

CREATE TABLE `urlcache` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , `url` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL , `def_url` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL , `project_id` INT NOT NULL , `pages_id` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL , `language_id` INT NOT NULL , `cachetime` INT NOT NULL , `lastcache` INT NOT NULL ) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci;
ALTER TABLE `urlcache` ADD `http` INT NOT NULL AFTER `url` , ADD `https` INT NOT NULL AFTER `http`;
ALTER TABLE `urlcache` DROP `def_url`;

ALTER TABLE `urlcache` ADD `domain_url` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL AFTER `url` , ADD `root_url` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL AFTER `domain_url` , ADD `virtual_url` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL AFTER `root_url`;

CREATE TABLE `embedded_resource` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , `type` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL , `url` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL , `rid` INT NULL , `cache` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL ) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci;

CREATE TABLE `web_forward` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , `rule` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL , `condition` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL , `enabled` INT NOT NULL ) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci;
ALTER TABLE `web_forward` ADD `page_id` INT NOT NULL AFTER `condition` , ADD `lang_id` INT NOT NULL AFTER `page_id;
ALTER TABLE `web_forward` ADD `type` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL AFTER `id`;
ALTER TABLE `web_forward` ADD `order` INT NOT NULL AFTER `lang_id`;
ALTER TABLE `web_url` ADD `default` INT NOT NULL AFTER `https`;
delete from `user_in_group` where `gid` in (select `gid` from `group` where `name` in ("cms-access", "floorball-access"));
delete from `group` where `name` in ("cms-access", "floorball-access");

insert into `group_perms`(`group_id`, `name`, `value`, `type`) values (1, 'CMS.Web.Pages', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Web', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Web.TextFiles', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Web.Templates', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Web.Articles', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Web.Guestbooks', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Web.EmbeddedResources', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Web.WebForwards', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Web.WebProjects', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Web.FileManager', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Web.CustomForms', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Hint', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.HintProperties', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.HintPerms', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Web.Floorball', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Floorball.Projects', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Floorball.Seasons', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Floorball.Rounds', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Floorball.Tables', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Floorball.Teams', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Floorball.Players', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Floorball.Matches', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Floorball.TablesContent', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Web.Settings', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Settings.Users', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Settings.UrlCache', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Settings.UserLog', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Settings.Languages', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Settings.Keywords', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Settings.ApplicationLog', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Settings.DatabaseConnections', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Settings.PersonalProperties', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Settings.PersonalNotes', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Settings.Groups', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Settings', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Floorball', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Web.ArticleLabels', 'true', 'bool'),(1, 'CMS.Web.ArticleLines', 'true', 'bool');

CREATE TABLE `system_adminmenu` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY ,`name` TINYTEXT NOT NULL ,`page_id` TINYTEXT NOT NULL ,`icon` TINYTEXT NOT NULL ,`perm` TINYTEXT NOT NULL) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci
INSERT INTO `group_perms` (`group_id` ,`name` ,`value` ,`type`) VALUES ('1', 'CMS.Settings.AdminMenu', 'true', 'bool');
INSERT INTO `group_perms` (`group_id` ,`name` ,`value` ,`type`) VALUES ('1', 'CMS.AdminMenu', 'true', 'bool');
CREATE TABLE `inquiry` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY ,`question` TINYTEXT NOT NULL ,`enabled` BOOL NOT NULL) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci;

CREATE TABLE `inquiry_answer` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY ,`inquiry_id` INT NOT NULL ,`answer` TINYTEXT NOT NULL ,`count` INT NOT NULL) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci;

CREATE TABLE `inquiry_vote` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,`inquiry_id` INT NOT NULL ,`answer_id` INT NOT NULL, `timestamp` INT NOT NULL ,`ip_address` TINYTEXT NOT NULL) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci;
INSERT INTO `group_perms` (`id` ,`group_id` ,`name` ,`value` ,`type`)VALUES (NULL , '1', 'CMS.Web.Inquiries', 'true', 'bool';
ALTER TABLE `inquiry` ADD `allow_multiple` BOOL NOT NULL;
CREATE TABLE `rolecache` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY ,`source_id` INT NOT NULL ,`target_id` INT NOT NULL) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci;
INSERT INTO `group_perms` (`group_id` ,`name` ,`value` ,`type`) VALUES ('1', 'CMS.Settings.RoleCache', 'true', 'bool');
INSERT INTO `group_perms` (`group_id` ,`name` ,`value` ,`type`) VALUES ('1', 'Page.ManageProperties', 'true', 'bool');

CREATE TABLE `page_property_value` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY ,`page_id` INT NOT NULL ,`name` TINYTEXT NOT NULL ,`value` TINYTEXT NOT NULL) ENGINE = MYISAM CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci;
ALTER TABLE `file` ADD `url` TINYTEXT NULL AFTER `title`;
ALTER TABLE `w_sport_table` ADD `positionfix` INT NOT NULL AFTER `season`;
ALTER TABLE `article_line` ADD `parentdirectory_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `url`;
ALTER TABLE `article` ADD `directory_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `visible`;

CREATE TABLE `article_label_language` ( `label_id` INT NOT NULL , `language_id` INT NOT NULL , `name` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NULL , `url` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`label_id`, `language_id`)) ENGINE = MYISAM;
ALTER TABLE `article_label` ADD `order` INT NULL DEFAULT '1' AFTER `url`;
UPDATE `article_label` SET `order` = `id`;

CREATE TABLE `application_variable` ( `name` VARCHAR(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NOT NULL , `value` TINYTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_czech_ci NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`name`)) ENGINE = MYISAM;
INSERT INTO `group_perms` (`group_id`, `name`, `value`, `type`) VALUES (1, 'CMS.Settings.Update', 'true', 'bool');
ALTER TABLE `page_file_inc` ADD `order` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `language_id`;
UPDATE `page_file_inc` SET `order` = `file_id`;

ALTER TABLE `w_sport_tables` ADD `points_win` TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT '3' AFTER `name`, ADD `points_win_extratime` TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT '2' AFTER `points_win`, ADD `points_draw` TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' AFTER `points_win_extratime`, ADD `points_loose_extratime` TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' AFTER `points_draw`, ADD `points_loose` TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `points_loose_extratime`;
ALTER TABLE `web_project` DROP `error_all_pid`, DROP `error_404_pid`, DROP `error_403_pid`;
